name: Saurabh Bagchi
content: Saurabh Bagchi (area chair) - Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering - Purdue University Saurabh Bagchi (area chair) Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering Director for Corporate Partnership Campus: West Lafayette Office: BHEE 325 Office Phone: +1 765-494-1741 Phone: +1 765-427-5708 Fax: +1 765-494-2706 E-mail: sbagchi@purdue.edu Webpage: https://bagchi.github.io/ Address Purdue University Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering Max W and Maileen Brown Family Hall 465 Northwestern Ave. West Lafayette, Indiana 47907-2035 Degrees BTech, Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, 1996 MS, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 1998 PhD, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 2001 Research Dependable distributed systems, secure autonomy, embedded wireless networks, predictable machine learning. Areas of Interest Computer Engineering (Area Chair) Communications, Networking, Signal & Image Processing Indicates primary area for this faculty member. Note that a few faculty members have more than one primary area.
